home_welcome_description: Here you'll find a variety of articles and tutorials on topics such as web development, software engineering, and programming languages.
wave_card_description: Fast and convenient search for information on the Internet. Convenient interface for entering queries and viewing results
quantum_engine_card_description: Powerful and flexible game engine designed to create high-quality 2D and 3D games
dialog_chat_card_description: Communication with free messaging features, video chats, voice calls, group messages
workspace_card_description: Text editors, email, calendar, task and project management system
call_to_action: Want to know more about our projects?
call_to_action_description: Check out the GitHub repositories for our projects
about_blog: Input Studio Blog is a blog that I created to share my througts and ideas with the world. I am a software engineer and I love to write about my experiences and things that I have learned. I hope you enjoy reading my blog.
about_search: On this blog, you'll find weekly articles and tutorials on topic such as web development, software engineering, and programming language. Input Studios is always learning and exploring new technologies, so be sure to check back often for new content!
about_description: We encourage you to leave comments om our posts and engage with other readers. You can like other people's comments and reply to them as well. We belive that a community of learners can help each other grow and improve.
support_faster: Now we`ll be able to get you the right help and support faster.
help_and_support: Sign in so we can get you the right help and support.
select_need_help: Select the product you need help with
show_self_help: We`ll show you self-help options first. Additional help is available if you need it, including live chat with a Input Studios specialist.
sign_up_business_assist: Sign up for Business Assist to get professional advice from small business experts. Are you already subscribed?
service_request: Open a service request in the Input Studios Workspace Admin Center. This service is free.
get_help_support_purchase: Get help and support whether you're shopping now or need help with a past purchase.
rules_conduct_community: Rules of conduct in the community
use_cookies: Most Input Studios websites use cookies. Cookies are small text files that websites write to devices to store data for future visits. Input Studios and our partners use cookies to remember your preferences and settings, make it easier to sign in to your accounts, show you personalized ads, and analyze how well our websites perform. For more information, please see the Cookies and similar technologies sections in the Privacy Statement.
use_necessary_cookies: We use necessary cookies to enable core functionality of the website. For example, they are used for account sign-in, saving language preferences, creating a shopping cart, improving performance, routing traffic between web servers, recognizing screen size, determining page load time, improving user experience, and for audience estimation. These cookies are essential for the operation of our websites.
use_analytical_cookies: We allow third parties to use analytics cookies to understand how you use our websites so that we can improve them and the third parties can create and improve their products. These products may be used on sites that are not owned or controlled by Input Studios. For example, they are used to collect information about the pages you visit and how many mouse clicks it takes to complete a task. We use some analytics cookies for advertising.
use_cookies_social_networks: We and third parties use social media cookies to show you advertising and content based on your social media profiles and activity on our websites. They are used to connect your activity on our websites with your social media profiles so that the ads and content you see on our websites and social networks better reflect your interests.
use_advertising_cookies: We and third parties use advertising cookies to show you new ads by knowing which ads you have already seen. They are also used to track the ads you click on or purchases you make after clicking an ad to pay, and to show you ads that are more relevant to you. For example, they are used to detect when you click on an ad and serve ads based on your social media interests and web browsing history. We and third parties use advertising cookies to show you new ads by knowing which ads you have already seen. They are also used to track the ads you click on or purchases you make after clicking an ad to pay, and to show you ads that are more relevant to you. For example, they are used to detect when you click on an ad and serve ads based on your social media interests and web browsing history.

about_company_heading_title: Our mission is to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more.

get_to_know_our_people: Get to know some of our people, explore engaging stories, and meet the leaders who shape our vision.
meet_people: Meet the people of Input Studios
utilize_technology: See how we utilize technology to build platforms and resources to help make a lasting positive impact.
get_in_touch: Get in touch. We’re here to help.
carbon_negative_by_2030: Input Studios will be carbon negative by 2030. Get an interactive look at other ways our company is improving our environmental impact.
technology_for_good: We believe technology is a powerful force for good and are working to foster a sustainable future where everyone has access to the benefits and opportunities created by technology.
inspired_by_people: At Input Studios, we're inspired by people around the world who use technology to do imaginative, innovative, and life-changing things. We share their stories.
ai_with_people_at_center: When designed with people at the center, AI can extend your capabilities, free you up for more creative and strategic endeavors, and help you and your organization achieve more.
cookie_consent: We use cookies to offer you a better browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. Read about how we use cookies and how you can control them by visiting our Cookie Settings page. If you continue to use this site, you consent to our use of cookies.
